description: Gun Metal Blue is the perfect drink to serve at your next get-together, guaranteed to leave you feeling refreshed and satisfied. This cocktail will wow your guests with its&nbsp;stunning blue color and delicious flavor. So why not give it a try? We promise you won't be disappointed.
name: Gun Metal Blue
recipeIngredient: 1/3 oz. Chilled water (not needed if using ice for shaking)

recipeInstructions.name: Add all ingredients into a shaker with ice.
recipeInstructions.text: Add all ingredients into a shaker with ice.

recipeInstructions.name: Strain into a chilled margarita glass and garnish with a lime wheel and mint.
recipeInstructions.text: Strain into a chilled margarita glass and garnish with a lime wheel and mint.
